text.__SUMMARY__: Fusarium acaciae-mearnsii is a fungus species of the genus Fusarium which produces zearalenone and zearalenol.
text.Further reading: Leslie, John F.; Bullock, Brett A. Summerell ; photographs by Suzanne (2008). The Fusarium Laboratory Manual (1st ed.). Hoboken: John Wiley & Sons. ISBN 0-470-27646-0.
